title: New: Grinderman – Evil (Silver Alert Remix) [Featuring Matt Berninger]
content:
It’s about time we heard more of Berninger’s sultry tones, and this new Silver Alert remix of Grinderman’s Evil just so happens to feature the vocal talents of The National frontman.

Set to be included on an upcoming remix release entitled Grinderman 2 RMX, alongside efforts from Robert Fripp, Josh Homme and Cat’s Eyes. It’s a slightly bizarre affair, twisting rapidly between pitch shifted vocals and the recognizable drawl of Berninger, whilst remaining thoroughly engaging throughout. Check it out below, and watch out for the Grinderman 2 RMX which drops 26 March 2012.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
